articles.description: The connection between Rangitaranga and Vikrant Rona may not have hit the audience until they watched the movie, and found out that this film was also set in Kamarottu. And the events in Vikrant Rona happen many years before the events of Rangitaranga.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Explained: What is in Chile’s proposed new constitution?
articles.description: The proposed new text was written by a 154-member body elected through a popular vote, the first time in Chile's history a constitution was drafted democratically.
